name: Tom Vs The Dinos
description:
The Earth has been invaded by an army of evil...
...Dinosaurs? Yep, and its up to you to stop them once and for all in TOM VS THE DINOS

Traverse many unique environments ranging from city rooftops to our moon!

Fight off the evil dinosaurs that have invaded our planet!

And even compete against a friend in an offline multiplayer game!


Features:
-SIngle Player platforming adventure mode
-Offline Multiplayer battle mode
-Controller Support


Special Thanks to artist 2DHumanity for making the soundtrack to this game!
The game is mostly finished, but there will need to be a few changes
